subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Chelsea gained an early advantage over Manchester United in the English Premier League title race, routing Portsmouth, 4-0. Manchester United tied visiting Newcastle, 1-1, on the opening weekend of the season. Chelsea, which finished second last season to Manchester United in England and in the Champions League, won easily at home in Manager Luiz Felipe Scolari’s first game. Joe Cole, Nicolas Anelka, Frank Lampard and Deco scored.
